body:
Modifications : 
- [x] basic installation of SuiteSparse
- [x] added SuiteSparse support to eigen

Notes:
A full spec must be given to appropriately set-up shared lapack and blas, i.e. : 

```
spack install  SuiteSparse ^ netlib-lapack+shared ^ netlib-blas+fpic
```

this relates to the discussion in #391
title: Added package : SuiteSparse
